name: Damien Garreau
content: Theory of Machine Learning - Center for Artificial Intelligence and Data Science Intern Animation stoppen Center for Artificial Intelligence and Data Science Our group is working towards the theoretical understanding of machine learning algorithms. We are interested in questions such as: What kind of guarantees can we give for a specific class of algorithms? Can we pinpoint failure cases of well-known methods? At the moment, our focus is on interpretable AI, that is, the set of methods used to explain the decisions of black-box algorithms.
